item.title: Dragon Is Dead
item.description:
Title: Dragon Is Dead
Genre: Action , Indie , RPG
Developer: TeamSuneat
Publisher: PM Studios, inc.
Release Date: Jun 6, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Jun 7, 2024




About This Game

Prologue

The black dragon [Guernian], who once faced down the gods, has fallen. From the rift he fled before his death, an unholy energy has spread across the world, and life is undergoing a bizarre mutation. People call it Corruption and live their days in fear, but few know its trustworthy source and full extent.

Player = Successor

You are an immortal warrior, a so-called Successor, chosen by the God of Light [Lu], the God of Fire [Ashuran], and the God of Water [Harnia]. When you die in battle, you return to the source of your lineage and are resurrected, growing stronger through the experience, equipment, and rune power you accumulate along the way. Arriving in Cliffshire, a town of light, the Successors must head to a burial ground where demons are said to be manifesting and follow clues to cleanse the distorted world.

Core Gameplay

The game plays out as 2D platformer action requiring precise dodging and pattern-breaking. Each area is a vertically and horizontally intertwined, multi-layered structure that regenerates in a rogue-lite fashion with different terrain, monster placement, and loot composition on each exploration. When you die, you lose your gold and temporary buffs, but your gear and runes are permanently preserved and become the basis for the next cycle. Defeating bosses yields rune stones that can be used to craft or awaken legendary gear, and artifacts found during exploration can bring both powerful blessings and dangerous curses depending on the combination, providing new tactical tension each time.

The current situation

Corrupted enemies are gradually expanding their territory, threatening neighboring regions. In this chaos, the Black Dawn is leading the Corruption from behind the scenes, but their true purpose is shrouded in mystery. Lore says that only by destroying the [Guernians] will the lost order return, but the deeper you explore, the more you question the truth of even this belief. The closer you get to the citadel, the more you'll come face-to-face with the greater secret that brought the world to its knees.

item.title: Zombie Graveyard Simulator
item.description:
Title: Zombie Graveyard Simulator
Genre: Action , Indie , Simulation
Developer: threeW
Publisher: PlayWay S.A.
Franchise: PlayWay S.A.
Release Date: Jun 5, 2025




About This Game

In a world where the dead turn into zombies, your job is to manage your very own Graveyard! Perform burials and cremations, fulfill visitor requests, manage facilities, and keep your staff and defenses in top shape. But when night falls, everything changes. The dead may rest, but the zombies don‚Äôt. They are coming for your precious work!

Visitor Satisfaction is Key

After processing the bodies, visitors will return to check on their loved ones. Your duty is to keep graves intact while providing fresh flowers and maintaining a welcoming environment. Every visit rewards you with valuable bonuses to help your business thrive.

Visitors can also stop by the Chapel to rest and browse the Souvenir Shop for small keepsakes like candles and incenses. A clean and decorated graveyard encourages greater generosity while donating!

Build your Defenses

Each night, waves of zombies will come with their numbers growing and special zombie types emerging, hungry for freshly buried bodies and for you. From basic defenses like barbed wires and fences to advanced machines like automatic turrets, keep your defenses upgraded, repaired, and fully stocked with ammo to withstand the night.

Trust your Arsenal

With a variety of weapons, including pistols, rifles, shotguns, and your trusty shovel, you are the ultimate force against the Zombies. As you level up, unlock and purchase new weapons to become even stronger. Just make sure to stock up on enough ammo!

Even a Graveyard Can Be Cozy Sometimes!

Use your Farming Area to grow different flowers for profit and vegetables to simply eat and restore your energy and health. With Upgrades, you can even unlock a Grinder to turn zombie parts into Fertilizer. Decorate your Graveyard with benches, lights, and other ornaments to make it truly your own.

Expand and Upgrade Your Facilities

Your graveyard isn‚Äôt just a resting place, it's a business, and every upgrade matters. Expand your burial areas and upgrade your crematorium with more furnaces and automated systems. Improve your water supply , manage resource production , and decorate your grounds to stay ahead of growing demands.

Hire a team of employees to help with day-to-day tasks: the Florist keeps flowers running, the Gravekeeper maintains burials and cremations, the Gardener keeps your farm in check, and the Technician ensures all machines run smoothly.

Every improvement helps you stay one step ahead of both business demands and the undead threat.

Key Features

  • Manage and expand your own graveyard while balancing business and survival

  • Build and maintain defenses against nightly zombie attacks

  • Perform burials, cremations, and keep visitors satisfied with flowers and souvenirs

  • Operate a Chapel with a donation system and a fully stocked Souvenir Shop

  • Hire staff like Florists, Gravekeepers, Gardeners, and Technicians

  • Upgrade facilities including the crematorium, farming area, and water systems

  • Unlock new weapons and enhance your combat skills

  • Customize your graveyard with decorations and functional upgrades

  • Experience a mix of management, strategy, and first-person action

item.title: Parallel Experiment
item.description:
Title: Parallel Experiment
Genre: Adventure , Indie
Developer: Eleven Puzzles
Publisher: Eleven Puzzles
Franchise: Cryptic Killer
Release Date: Jun 5, 2025




About This Game

IMPORTANT : "Parallel Experiment" is a 2-player cooperative puzzle game with escape room-like elements. Each player must have their own copy on either mobile, tablet, PC or Mac (cross-platform play is supported).

In the game players take on the roles of two detectives who are often separated, each with different clues, and must work together to solve puzzles. Internet connection and voice communication are essential. Need a Player Two? Join our community on Discord! Find the link on the side of our Steam page.

Parallel Experiment is a noir-inspired adventure with a comic book art style, featuring detectives Ally and Old Dog. While following the trail of the dangerous Cryptic Killer, they suddenly become his targets and are now unwilling participants in his twisted experiment.

This is the second standalone chapter in the ‚ÄúCryptic Killer‚Äù cooperative point-and-click puzzle game series. You can play Unboxing the Cryptic Killer first, if you want to learn more about our detectives and their nemesis, but Parallel Experiment can be enjoyed without prior knowledge .

KEY FEATURES

üîç Two Player Co-Op

‚Äã In Parallel Experiment , players must rely on their communication skills as they‚Äôre separated and must each discover unique clues that are vital for solving puzzles on the other end. Teamwork is essential to crack the Cryptic Killer‚Äôs codes.

üß© Challenging Collaborative Puzzles

‚Äã There are over 80 puzzles striking the perfect balance between challenging yet fair. But you're not facing them on your own! Communicate with your partner on how to best proceed, solve a puzzle on your end that unlocks the next step for them and discover a wide variety of puzzles from redirecting water flows, finding computer passwords and unlocking intricate locks, to deciphering cryptic ciphers, soldering electronic components, and even waking up a drunk!

üïπÔ∏è Two Can Play That Game

‚Äã Looking for a break from the main investigation? Dive into a variety of retro-inspired mini-games designed with a fresh cooperative twist. Challenge each other to darts, Three in a Row, Match Three, Claw Machine, Push and Pull, and more. Think you know these classics? We‚Äôve reinvented them for a whole new co-op experience

üó®Ô∏è Cooperative Dialogues

‚Äã Uncover vital clues through collaborative conversations. NPCs respond dynamically to each player, offering new layers of interaction that only teamwork can unravel. Some conversations are puzzles in themselves that you need to solve together!

üñºÔ∏è A story told in panels

Our love for comic books shines in Parallel Experiment. Every cutscene is presented as a beautifully crafted comic book page, immersing you in a gripping, noir-inspired narrative.

How many pages did we create to tell the story? Almost 100 pages! Even we were surprised by how much it took, but every panel was worth it to deliver a story that keeps you on edge until the very last frame.

‚úçÔ∏è Draw on‚Ä¶ Everything!

‚Äã Every detective needs a notebook. In Parallel Experiment , players can jot down notes, sketch solutions, and interact with the environment in creative ways. But we all know what you're going to draw first‚Ä¶

üêí Annoy Each Other

‚ÄãThis is a key feature? Yes. Yes, it is. ‚Äã

‚ÄãEach level will have some way for players to annoy their co-op partner: knock on a window to distract them, poke them, make their screens shake. You already know you'll be doing this just by reading it, right?

Parallel Experiment has a variety of mind-twisting challenges that push the boundaries of cooperative puzzle design, offering situations never seen before in other games.
